table.searchString: index=* | eval eventcount=1 | eval eventsize=len(_raw) | eval eps=eventcount/(5*60.0) | eval thruput=eventsize/(1024.0*5*60.0) | stats sparkline(sum(eps), 5m) as "Events per second", sparkline(sum(thruput), 5m) as "Event throughput (kbps)", sum(eventsize) as total_event_size, avg(eps) as "Average Events per second" | eval "Total MB"=total_event_size/(1024.0*1024.0) | fields "Events per second", "Event throughput (kbps)", "Average Events per second", "Total MB"
